items.sentence: Let\'s not forget that Tom is depending on our help.
Let\'s see if we can come up with a better solution.
Tom won the lottery, but went bankrupt a year later.
Tom is going to go sailing with Mary this afternoon.
Tom is talking with someone right now. Can you wait?
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary is trying to accomplish.
Tom tried to get the splinter out of Mary\'s finger.
Tom usually starts his day with a hot cup of coffee.
Tom wanted to spend the rest of his life in America.
Tom wants me to go to Boston with him to visit Mary.
Tom pulled the nail out of the board with a crowbar.
Tom put his arms around Mary and hugged her tightly.
Which hotel will you stay in when you\'re in Boston?
Tom is the best dancer in the group and he knows it.
Tom is the one who convinced Mary to try to do that.
Tom is the one who should be blamed for the failure.
Tom and Mary were shocked, and John was embarrassed.
Tom ate breakfast while his wife read the newspaper.
Tom called Mary to ask her to help at the bake sale.
Tom and Mary know something they\'re not telling us.
